column5: So who is all going to the Muskie Odyssey this coming weekend the 29 th of April?? Should a great time as usual!!
we will be there. every 2 years,so I will not miss it.
The girlfriend and I will be attending as well.
I'll be there - very much looking forward to it.  This is the first one I've ever attended and I have heard its a great show.
What a great show it was! I picked up lots of bait and took lots of notes from the seminars. Can't wait for the next one!
was an awesome event. we had a booth. was great to see folks and catch up. if you missed it you missed out on a gr8 musky show.
Had a great time there myself, saw a lot of friends and met a lot of new people.  Attendance was great and really enjoyed the seminars and talking with all the vendors.

It was a good show, big turn out. Arrived at 8:30 and the Wick Onez booth was sold out. I was thankfully able to get one of the few remaining hose shads. Also picked up a Blue Water Bait from Lidio and a new Trofik 5 bait. Both guys make some great stuff.

I agree on the BWB and Trofik 5 baits- amazing quality and the owners were great guys to talk to. I picked up some Northmen Outdoors big dirtys and cabbage cutters, a Bondy bait, a custom SSpanky double 10, and an Apache triple 9. Will be picking up some trolling baits next Odyssey for sure.
